item.title: Photoshop-4: Recording watercolour canvas effect action & replaying with ONE button in Adobe Photoshop CC 2018
item.author: michtintin
item.description: Recording watercolour canvas effect action & replaying with ONE button in Adobe Photoshop CC 2018. Introduction. 00:00-0:08 Hi Everyone. My name is Michele and in this tutorial I’m going to show you how to do this. Creating a watercolor effect with one button. Let’s get started. Open up a drawing and pick a brush. 0:08-0:53 So once you’ve open up a drawing which is 300 pixels per inch. Size, any size is up to you.
